name: Action RPG (panicoli0)
description:
Action RPG game made with the Unity Creator Kit

Game Rule: Destroy all cactus around the map 🌵

  • Use left click to move around the map and interact/pick-up items.
  • Use mouse-scroll to zoom-in or zoom-out.
  • Use "I" to open your Inventory. 

Objective:

  • Identify key information in simple C# scripts
  • Write simple instructions to change the player experience
  • Understand the role of variables, functions, and classes — and how they can be used to write efficient code
  • Edit simple scripts and test the impact of your changes on the player experience
